harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)

sentences.english: Show Western influence, many of the buildings reflects the combination of Chinese and Western content style.
sentences.chinese: 因受西方影响，许多建筑都体现了中西合璧的风格。

sentences.english: Warlords built private gardens in Chinese and west styles with literatus' help.
sentences.chinese: 武人在文人的帮助之下建设有中西合璧的私家园林。

sentences.english: I learn from the doctor who have to use chinese and western medical for me.
sentences.chinese: 我学今日用中西何合璧帮我睇病嘅𠮶个医生。

sentences.english: Breakfast at the hotel was an interesting mix of foreign and local breakfast options.
sentences.chinese: 酒店的早点是中西合璧的。

sentences.english: Basically, it is secondary education, and our goal is to cultivate first-class citizens.
sentences.chinese: 完整的高中课程教育，中西合璧培育优秀世界公民。

sentences.english: Dali Zhang's painting, of course, is a combination of Chinese and Western elements.
sentences.chinese: 张大力的油画，当然是一种东西合璧。

sentences.english: This is really the perfect ideal of Chinese and Western combine style.
sentences.chinese: 在这里中西合璧，完美的组合了。

sentences.english: Warlords built private gardens in Chinese and west styles with literary' help.
sentences.chinese: 武人在文人的帮助之下建设有中西合璧的私家园林。
